articles.description: Follow match build-up, live text updates and listen to radio commentary from the opening weekend of the Premier League, starting with Ipswich Town taking on Liverpool.
articles.title: Ipswich Town v Liverpool LIVE: Premier League score, commentary, line-ups, stats & latest updates, followed by five more matches

articles.description: Preview, live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Arsenal vs Wolverhampton Wanderers in the Premier League
articles.title: Arsenal 2-0 Wolves: Bukayo Saka and Kai Havertz on target as Gunners open with win

articles.description: Liverpool marked Arne Slot's first Premier League game with some "breathtaking football" to ensure they made a winning start under the Dutchman, says Peter Crouch.
articles.title: Ipswich 0-2 Liverpool: How Arne Slot’s Liverpool machine kicked into gear

articles.description: Birmingham Phoenix face Southern Brave in the men’s Hundred Eliminator – follow radio commentary & score updates.
articles.title: The Hundred 2024 LIVE: Birmingham Phoenix vs Southern Brave eliminator - cricket score & radio commentary

articles.description: Brighton's 31-year-old manager Fabian Hurzeler starts his tenure with an impressive Premier League victory, as Everton begin their final season at Goodison Park miserably.
articles.title: Everton 0-3 Brighton: Youngest manager Fabian Hurzeler makes instant impact in Premier League

articles.description: New Zealand thrash Argentina 42-10 to avenge the defeat by the Pumas in their opening match of the 2024 Rugby Championship.
articles.title: Rugby Championship: All Blacks thrash Argentina to avenge defeat by Pumas

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Newcastle United vs Southampton in the Premier League
articles.title: Newcastle United 1-0 Southampton: Premier League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text coverage of Saturday's five Scottish League Cup ties.
articles.title: Saturday's Scottish League Cup - radio & text: BBC Sport

articles.description: Jack Draper beats Felix Auger-Aliassime in controversial circumstances at the Cincinnati Open as Carlos Alcaraz smashes his racquet during a defeat by Gael Monfils.
articles.title: Cincinnati Open: Jack Draper earns controversial win as Carlos Alcaraz smashes racquet in defeat

articles.description: London Spirit comfortably beat city rivals Oval Invincibles by eight wickets to reach The Hundred final.
articles.title: The Hundred Eliminator 2024: London Spirit brush Oval Invincibles aside to reach first final
